targets.expr: ((sum( max_over_time(requests_total_value{ instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action",http_status_code_group="4xx",connector_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]) - min_over_time(requests_total_value{ instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action",http_status_code_group="4xx",connector_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]))) OR vector(0)) + ((sum(max_over_time(requests_total_value{ instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action",http_status_code_group="5xx",connector_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]) - min_over_time(requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action",http_status_code_group="5xx",connector_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]))) OR vector(0))

((sum( max_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action",connector_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient",http_status_code_group="4xx"}[1m]) - min_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action",connector_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient",http_status_code_group="4xx"}[1m])) OR vector(0)) + ((sum(max_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action",connector_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient",http_status_code_group="5xx"}[1m]) - min_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action",connector_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient",http_status_code_group="5xx"}[1m])) OR  vector(0) )))*100 / sum( max_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action",connector_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]) - min_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action",connector_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]))
